text:
Haha, you're humming a tune.
You're in a really good mood.

It's okay, I understand.
You were in sync with the staff today.

Yes...
Actually, I took the plunge and talked to the staff members.
Turns out, they're all really nice people...

They were all worried about how to interact with
idols since it was their first time working with them.

But when they heard about your experiences at the
store, they seemed curious to learn more too...

Oh, I see!
If it gave you the courage to take action, then it's a good thing.
